title: Explore Party Differences and Values with the Election Compass

intro.title: Welcome to Exploring Party Differences and Values with the Election Compass for Young People
intro.ingress: Answer the Election Compass questions in a way that ranks the assigned party below as your top result.
intro.content: Use the assigned party‚Äôs website as a reference while answering. Pay close attention to their municipal and county election programs.

perfect.title: Congratulations!
perfect.ingress: You ranked the party {targetName} {targetRankMembers, plural, =1 {} other {in a tie for}} first place!

good.title: Almost perfect!
good.ingress: You ranked the party {targetName} {targetRankMembers, plural, =1 {} other {in a tie for}} place {targetRank}!

fair.title: Good effort!
fair.ingress: You ranked the party {targetName} {targetRankMembers, plural, =1 {} other {in a tie for}} place {targetRank}!

notAvailable.title: No result‚Ä¶
notAvailable.ingress: The game result could not be calculated. Have you answered all the questions?

common.editAnswersTip: Try modifying your answers to get the assigned party to the first place. You can see the party‚Äôs stances by clicking on the party name.
common.resultsTip: You can return to the results by tapping this icon in the top bar.

exitGameMode: Back to the Regular Election Compass for Young People
